mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, date_format(tt.view_date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') viewDateStr, tt.view_notes viewNotes, dct1.dict_value interviewResultId, dct1.`name` interviewResult, dct2.dict_value resultReasonId, dct2.`name` resultReason, tt.reason_other reasonOther, case tt.schedule_id WHEN 0 THEN tt.view_target else tt.name end viewTarget FROM(SELECT r.id, r.view_date, r.view_target, r.interview_result, case WHEN locate('Veto',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN locate('Undetermined',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN locate('Following',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, r.result_reason, r.view_notes, r.reason_other, con.name, r.schedule_id FROM sop_interview_record r LEFT JOIN schedule_contacts con on r.view_target=con.id WHERE r.project_id=#{projectId} and r.interview_valid =0 ORDER BY r.view_date desc) tt LEFT JOIN dict dct1 ON dct1.parent_code='meetingResult' and dct1.dict_code=tt.interview_result LEFT JOIN dict dct2 ON dct2.parent_code=tt.resultReason and dct2.dict_code=tt.result_reason ORDER BY tt.view_date ${direction} LIMIT #{offset},${limit};

SELECT count(1) FROM(SELECT r.id, r.view_date, r.view_target, r.interview_result, case WHEN locate('Veto',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN locate('Undetermined',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN locate('Following',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, r.result_reason, r.view_notes, r.reason_other, con.name, r.schedule_id FROM sop_interview_record r LEFT JOIN schedule_contacts con on r.view_target=con.id WHERE r.project_id=#{projectId} and r.interview_valid =0 ORDER BY r.view_date desc) tt LEFT JOIN dict dct1 ON dct1.parent_code='meetingResult' and dct1.dict_code=tt.interview_result LEFT JOIN dict dct2 ON dct2.parent_code=tt.resultReason and dct2.dict_code=tt.result_reason;

SELECT tt.id, date_format(tt.view_date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') viewDateStr, tt.view_notes viewNotes, tt.file_key fileKey, tt.file_length fileLength, tt.bucket_name bucketName, tt.file_name fileName, dct1.dict_value interviewResultId, dct1.dict_code interviewResultCode, dct1.`name` interviewResult, dct2.dict_value resultReasonId, dct2.dict_code resultReasonCode, dct2.`name` resultReason, tt.reason_other reasonOther, case tt.schedule_id WHEN 0 THEN tt.view_target else tt.name end viewTarget FROM( SELECT r.id, r.view_date, r.view_target, sf.file_key, sf.file_length, sf.bucket_name, sf.file_name, r.view_notes, r.interview_result, case WHEN locate('Veto',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN locate('Undetermined',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN locate('Following',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, r.result_reason, r.reason_other, con.name, r.schedule_id FROM sop_interview_record r LEFT JOIN schedule_contacts con on r.view_target=con.id left join sop_file sf on sf.id=r.file_id and sf.file_valid=1 WHERE r.id=#{talkRecordId} and r.interview_valid =0 )tt LEFT JOIN dict dct1 ON dct1.parent_code='meetingResult' and dct1.dict_code=tt.interview_result LEFT JOIN dict dct2 ON dct2.parent_code=tt.resultReason and dct2.dict_code=tt.result_reason;
